summary:
I describe myself as being energetic, organised and a goal orientated individual. I’ve excelled in many areas across various roles such as Finance and Management and since living in a technological advanced society the interest has gripped many young people and he is no exception.
 
I believes in making things happen and with the skills I’ve acquired over the years, I will be a great assest to any organization when given the opportunity. I am fully bilingual and have a real gift of understanding and communicating with people on all levels. I enjoy being challenged and easily interacts with others. Working well under pressure, allows me to strive for excellence. 
 
My reputation and work ethic are one of my greatest assets, therefore due to my personality traits being, confident, self-motivated and an enthusiastic professional, I strive to achieve excellence through my daily performance. I have strong verbal, writing, presentation and interpersonal communication skills with a proven ability to work in difficult situations, under pressure and provide a high level of service.

profile_positions.title: CS Junior Finance Specialist

profile_positions.description:
To assume full responsibility and accountability of the Vehicle and Asset Finance Processing Portfolio under Credit Recoveries at Standard Bank
Processing of invoices, refunds as well as VAF write offs within the stipulated turnaround time 
Ensure that the entire team compliment is available on a daily basis in order to structure the team for the day
To ensure operational efficiency, system optimisation and administrative support to all segments of the business
Ensuring high level of service and competitive turnaround times, thereby contributing to the Credit Recoveries Strategy
To ensure that staff are competent, trained and the correct culture and leadership qualities are introduced and maintained.
Manage staff to achieve set targets
Manage process requirements and time constraints
Monitor adherence to internal controls and regulatory requirements and enhancing procedures in need.
Compliance with Statutory, regulatory and Management requirements, to protect the reputation of the group and to avoid legal action/sanction in respect of regulatory compliance matters.
Coaching, Monitoring, performance management, training and staff.
Customer centricity
Ensuring the successful implementation of strategy changes by driving the change and providing support to the implementation team
Operate within delegated levels of authority.
Attend to all Operational and Service requirements of the customer within the budgets, targets and turnaround times defined.
Manage all aspects relating to the cost of processing and service delivery for the area, within defined and determined financial parameters.
Ensure that policies and procedures are adhered to as set out in Bank’s guidelines in order to minimize risk
profile_positions.title: Team Leader - Accounts Processing

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for capturing BEST (Business Online) payments
Responsible for the writing off of accounts.
Responsible for Section 129 and other Notices
Responsible for compiling accurate monthly statistics
Preparation of SAP reports 
Working on suspense reports various GL accounts 
Processing of SAP journals 
The handling of journals 
Accountable for the accurate preparation of all documents received..
Receive invoices from outside agencies as well as from other departments such as insurance, attorneys, credit control as well as legal department and outside collection agents
We then need to prepare the invoices for payment
We then need to pay the various clients as well as the outside agents and insurance claims
Ensure that SAP journals are correctly prepared and authorized.
Ensure that General Ledger accounts are balanced on a daily basis.
Ensure Un-Cleared account is cleared on a daily basis.
Reconciliation’s are prepared and maintained on a daily basis.
Operating within the laid down guidelines and authority levels.
Providing regular feedback to management with the issues relevant to the environment.
Resolving business queries.
Ensure that all administration functions associated with Recovery Accounting are a true reflection of affairs in the department.
Initiate innovative ideas on how current processes and systems can be improved.
Performing daily duties within the Bank’s Regulatory compliance.
Tracking of unallocated payments 
Prepare refund requests
Prepare payment transfer requests
Record daily Stats
Send Stats to the business 
Controls and monitors all payments of attorneys commissions
Takes ownership on resolves customer complaints and queries
Align business practices with social needs and expectations by helping to drive long-term sustainability
Build relationships with clients, attorneys and agents through regular engagement.
Shares information with others and knows how to network to facilitate the achievement of business objectives/targets.
profile_positions.title: Accounts Processing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a sales associate, needed to ensure that stock coming in and going out was done correctly. 
Merchandise had to be counted and captured to make sure those sales that were done that day was correct.
Monitor of stock coming in and going out
Capture of incoming stock from suppliers
Inform superiors about any variances immediately
Liaise with superiors regarding problems with stock or suppliers
Check that new stock is on the shelve at all times
Assist customers at all times with any queries they might have
Report all out of line activities to the manager
Providing the best customer service
Most of all executing all instructions to the best of my ability and maintained a professional image at all time
profile_positions.title: Retail Consultant & Rides Operator

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for the accurate preparation of all documents received.
Accountable for the accurate action coding of customer accounts on system SICCS`s on a daily basis.
Receive invoices from outside agencies as well as from other departments such as insurance, attorneys, credit control as well as legal department and outside collection agents
We then need to prepare the invoices for payment
We then need to pay the various clients as well as the outside agents and insurance claims
Once the invoice have been received and has been paid, we then send them for 
Authorization to management.
Once the payments have been authorised, we then capture the entries on the invoice on the system and debit the clients account.
Accountable for capturing BEST payments
Responsible for Section 129 and other Notices
Accountable to check RD reports daily and update schedules
Responsible for compiling accurate monthly statistics
profile_positions.title: Admin Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Assist with control of correct stock levels
Processing and distributions of orders to local suppliers 
Check suppliers’ invoices and compare with stores GRV
Capturing of incoming stock from suppliers
Inform suppliers about variances immediately
Liase with superiors regarding problems with stock or suppliers
Assist with stores admin when time on hand 
Assist with the preparation of monthly stock counts
Assist with the capturing of monthly stock counts
Housekeeping and tidiness of stores admin office must be a major priority
Liase with Sales Executives and Branches regarding deliveries
Schedule daily deliveries prior to the day of deliveries
Schedule daily deliveries and inform Dispatch Manager regarding deliveries
Manage and control drivers Cell Phones- monitor as per budget
Get REASONABLE quotations from external transporters 
Utilise and motivate transport staff efficiently 
Apply staff disciplinary procedures fairly where justified
Ensure that internal and external transport expenses are fully recovered
Control and maintain vehicle maintenance and services- consider budget
Ensure that staff is constantly trained on high levels of quality and company standards 
Ensure that drivers sign for all tools issued to them
Submit monthly report of internal and external transport expenses and recoveries to Purchasing/Warehouse Manager
